articles.title: Bacteria living in your gut causes depression, not a brain disorder
articles.description: As strange as this may sound, scientists believe that at least one type of bacteria in your gut actually causes depression, not your brain.

articles.title: Samsung engineers the most advanced Galaxy Z yet
articles.description: While people have long valued smartphones for their power, convenience and usability, they’ve also expected a mobile device that blends versatility with...

articles.title: It could be 2026 before all your Thread border routers work together
articles.description: Code in tvOS 26 shows Thread 1.4 is coming to Apple’s border routers this fall. But with Amazon and Google still on 1.3, you may be waiting a bit longer for that unified mesh network.

articles.title: Female Founder World
articles.description: Female Founder World is helping women scale smarter, not louder. Now, founder Jasmine Garnsworthy is teaming up with Adobe Express to turn knowledge into creative power.

articles.title: 'BrowserVenom' Windows Malware Preys on Users Looking to Run DeepSeek AI
articles.description: Antivirus provider Kaspersky traces the threat to malicious Google ads.

articles.title: Google completely remade its Snapseed iOS photo editor
articles.description: After several years, Google has released a major update to the iOS version of its Snapseed photo editor.

articles.title: Apple's AI-infused Siri may not show up until spring 2026
articles.description: Apple might not release its Apple Intelligence update to Siri until Spring 2026, nearly two years after it first announced the more capable version of its voice assistant.

articles.title: ASE, CRF Launch New Educational Collaboration
articles.description: The American Society of Echocardiography and Cardiovascular Research Foundation Launch New Educational Collaboration "to foster shared learning, drive innovation and strengthen connections across the cardiovascular community."

articles.title: Odhran Lynch returns in goal for Derry as Dublin name Con O’Callaghan on bench for crucial Group Four decider
articles.description: Derry and Dublin clash in Newry for place in All-Ireland knockout phase

articles.title: A Tabletop Games Gift Guide For Geeky Dads On Father’s Day
articles.description: Get your geeky dad some accessories from Battletech Heroscape, Cyberpunk RED and more for the upcoming Father's Day holiday.
